title: Web-Based Observational Practice and Collaborative Learning Course for Simulation-Based Medical Education Preparation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental medical terminology and basic anatomy knowledge
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning enhancement program conducted in a constrained technological environment centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can identify core procedures with 90% accuracy using web-based observational practice (OP) during the preparation phase before simulation-based training.
Through collaborative learning (COP), learners can generate three or more sophisticated analytical responses to simulation scenarios based on peer interactions.
Within one week after the course, learners reduce the average task completion time by 20% in simulation-based assessments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
